content:
I want to apply some changes to this extension
http://build.fhir.org/extension-request-replaces.html
and i see in the breadcrumb that this is under Workflow > NutritionOrder

1. where is that defined?
  2. OK to preapply and create a ticket?

I was changing the scope to include SupplyRequest in the extension's context. That I already changed.
While I'm at it, I might also change the breadcrumb which is not correct (right?)
